text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the official Iraqi press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Iraq and Jordan are holding trade talks in Amman.
- Iraqi embassy in Romania organises a festival in solidarity with Iraqi prisoners of war still detained in Iran.
- U.S. plans to reduce its Air Force troops in the Turkish base Incirlik.
(The above were also carried by al-Iraq and al-Jumhouriya)
- Iraq is taking part in Dubai international trade fair.
